profiles:
Summary Quality & Engineering Manager in High Tech Industries ; MS, MBA & BS Electronic Engineer with an ascending Sixteen-years career in World Class Multinational Manufacturing plants in Mexico, Asian countries and United States, some examples are Unisys, IBM (PC Company Division), International Rectifiers (IR Semiconductors), IBM (SS Division) & Hitachi Global Storage Technologies (Hard Disk Drives) and currently INTEL Corporation. More than ten years of experience and expertise in Quality Operations and Engineering [ Manufacturing Process Engineering, Quality Systems (implementation & maintenance), Quality Assurance, Quality Control, Customer Satisfaction & Reliability of Products ]. 
 
Goal: Engineering/Quality Executive Manager with responsibility to drive the organization to pursue World Class Excellence, Quality, Service and profitability goals based on strategic plans alignment to execution. Specialties:Quality Assurance (ASQ Member Certified); Quality Systems, Regulations & International Standards (ISO,FDA, ANSI, NOM, etc.) ; Project Management (PMI Certified Member),Six Sigma Black Belt Certified, LEAN Manufacturing, Advanced Statistical Methods applied to engineering, Process Engineering, Product Engineering, Reliability & Tests Engineering, Failure Analysis & Materials Characterization Laboratories, ESD Control, High Tech Clean Rooms, Contamination Control & Customer Satisfaction areas. Summary 18 years of experience in Software Development and Integration.  
 
Holding roles of project management and team management, including local and remote teams, as well as offshore project development.  
 
 
- In the role of team management, define and implement software development and test procedures, including continuous integration processes. Definition and tracking of performance metrics to measure and control the efficiency. 
 
- In the role of project management, leading diverse skilled teams, from electronics to software architect engineers, including local and offshore software development teams. Specialties:Continuous Integration, Gated Commits, Global Management, Process creation and development, SOW and off-shoring deployment, Software industrialization, Open source Summary 18 years of experience in Software Development and Integration.

An independent non-profit organization founded in 2009. Our mission is to enable an ecosystem that collaborates to create the richest and most satisfying user experiences for mobile devices. Supports open source collaboration, to provide a free software platform for tomorrow’s mobile devices. Strong collaboration with external companies providing software and services. Summary Accomplished director of quality and Project/Program Manager with deep and broad experience in Microprocessor, Wireless, and E-commerce software testing. Innovative strategist who improves test efficiency and quality simultaneously by defining and implementing automation strategy. Proven track record of managing the programs from start to finish for new product launches. Work effectively across disciplines to establish partnerships with senior leaders and executives to promote agility and high quality.  
•	Extensive experience in contributing to strategic planning and achieving goals.  
•	Experience in driving process improvement in entire engineering organization for ISO9000 standards.  
•	Strong abilities to work in any Software Development Cycle including Agile.
